archiefmat.titel: Stadhouderschap in relatie tot de gewesten, resp. Holland en Zeeland - Correspondentie
archiefmat.titel_eng: Stadtholdership in relation to the regions, respectively Holland and Zeeland - Correspondence
archiefmat.scope:
No. 1388: Correspondence with J. Bourcourd, banker in Amsterdam concerning the WIC.

No. 1396: Correspondence with J. Rendorp, heer van Marquette concerning Suriname.

No. 1490: Correspondence with J.A. van de Perre concerning Essequibo and Demerara.
archiefmat.notes:
Only approved consultation permitted.

No. 1388: Correspondence with J. Bourcourd, banker in Amsterdam concerning the WIC; No. 1396: Correspondence with J. Rendorp, heer van Marquette concerning Suriname; No. 1490: Correspondence with J.A. van de Perre concerning Essequibo and Demerara.

The "Middelburg" section (nos. 1531-1539) contains correspondence of members of the Radermacher, Van Citters and Schorer families.
